fields.description:
Specifies the caching requirements. Possible values are: **None,**
**ReadOnly,** **ReadWrite.** The default values are: **None for Standard
storage. ReadOnly for Premium storage.**
fields.name: Caching

fields.description:
Specifies how the virtual machines in the scale set should be created. The only
allowed value is: **FromImage.** This value is used when you are using an image
to create the virtual machine. If you are using a platform image, you also use
the imageReference element described above. If you are using a marketplace
image, you  also use the plan element previously described.
fields.name: CreateOption

fields.description:
Specifies whether OS Disk should be deleted or detached upon VMSS Flex deletion (This feature is available for VMSS with Flexible OrchestrationMode only).

Possible values:

**Delete** If this value is used, the OS disk is deleted when VMSS Flex VM is deleted.

**Detach** If this value is used, the OS disk is retained after VMSS Flex VM is deleted.

The default value is set to **Delete**. For an Ephemeral OS Disk, the default value is set to **Delete**. User cannot change the delete option for Ephemeral OS Disk.
fields.name: DeleteOption

fields.description:
Specifies the ephemeral disk Settings for the operating system disk used by the
virtual machine scale set.
fields.name: DiffDiskSettings

fields.description:
Specifies the size of an empty data disk in gigabytes. This element can be used
to overwrite the size of the disk in a virtual machine image. The property 'diskSizeGB'
is the number of bytes x 1024^3 for the disk and the value cannot
be larger than 1023.
fields.name: DiskSizeGB

fields.description: Specifies information about the unmanaged user image to base the scale set on.
fields.name: Image

fields.description:
This property allows you to specify the type of the OS that is included in the
disk if creating a VM from user-image or a specialized VHD. Possible values
are: **Windows,** **Linux.**
fields.name: OsType

fields.description:
Specifies the container urls that are used to store operating system disks for
the scale set.
fields.name: VhdContainers

fields.description: Specifies whether writeAccelerator should be enabled or disabled on the disk.
fields.name: WriteAcceleratorEnabled
